verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peal (peal) out the watchword Silence (silence) it never Song (song) of our spirits rejoicing and free Peal (peal) out the watchword Loyal (loyal) forever King (King) of our lives By Thy grace we will be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}True hearted wholehearted Faithful and loyal King of our lives By Thy grace we will be Under the standard exalted and royal Strong in Thy strength We will battle for Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}True hearted wholehearted Fullest allegiance Yieldingh henceforth to our glorious King Valiant endeavor and loving obedience Freely and joyously now we would bring{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}True hearted wholehearted Savior all glorious Take Thy great power And reign there alone Over our wills and affections victorious Freely surrendered And wholly Thine own{/lang-eng}
